'''Stefano Baldo''' is an Italian fantasy artist. In the 1990s, he was commissioned by [[Iron Crown Enterprises]] to create art for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]].<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://ideacrylic.jimdofree.com/about-1/|articlename=About|website=Artist's website|author=Stefano Baldo}}</ref>
